history.content:
CS 168 isn't too hard. Projects are a bit tough, but they're not too work-intensive. Content itself is not too challenging as well, so it would be a good class to take with something like 151.

-------

I personally haven't taken and will not be taking EECS151 but I have noticed that from my friends who have taken it before, there seems to be a consensus that 151 is extremely time consuming, especially when moving towards the end of the semester. I had a friend in 151 last semester and she said it was a nightmare in terms of the workload. So I would probably stay away from it if you are planning to take other heavy classes. That being said, 168 is generally perceived as a light workload class even though it is listed as a project class. I have heard a lot of my friends saying good things about 168 so I guess it should be fine. Just FYI, I think "project classes" that your heard about are probably referring to the EE/EECS classes. Generally CS classes don't have a huge component of project except for 160/169 for obvious reasons.

________________________

151 is a pretty conceptually easy class, but a massive workload in the second half the semester (like a near full time job). It complements well with anything that is more conceptually challenging but low workload.

CS 168 isn't too hard. Projects are a bit tough, but they're not too work-intensive. Content itself is not too challenging as well, so it would be a good class to take with something like 151.

-------

Generally CS classes don't have a huge component of project except for 160/169 for obvious reasons.
CS 168 isn't too hard. Projects are a bit tough, but they're not too work-intensive. Content itself is not too challenging as well, so it would be a good class to take with something like 151.

children.subject: Are you looking for the draft schedule?
Does anyone know who's teaching 151 next semester?

history.content: Would taking these two classes in the same semester be too much of a workload? I keep hearing not to take any other project classes with 151...
history.subject: EECS 151 and CS 168
